explanation: [0-0] A tennis player in red shorts and a white shirt stands on the court. He wears black socks and yellow sneakers, a red cap, and holds a racket. The background shows part of the tennis court, an advertising board with the "ROLEX" logo and time, and an electronic scoreboard displaying "6:7 6:3 0:0 9:0" from left to right. There is a TennisTV watermark in the upper left corner.
